Articles.Content: I cant seam to undock in space. I have tried looking for "ReleaseVessel", under ExLaunchpad but cant find it in any save files. I am runnin win7 ksp9 latest version of Ex luanchpad

Hi,

It should be in that user interface once the ship is built...it was strange for me as well; I seemed to have had to reopen the UI twice to get to that point to release the ship - there is an option to fill it up with gas prior to releasing (!); I seem to miss that.

Cmdr Zeta
When i slect finalize i get switched to the ship i just made and every thing is locked and i cant reopen the ui
